__documentation.summary: Opens the web reference modal for inserting a web reference.

params.name: modalIcon
params.description: (Optional) The icon being shown at the top of the modal. The value should be a valid font-awsome icon name.

params.name: modalPrimaryButtonLabel
params.description: (Optional) The label for the primary button. Defaults to `t__Insert`.

params.name: modalTitle
params.description: (Optional) The title being shown at the top of the modal. Defaults to `t__Edit hyperlink`.

params.name: url
params.description: (Optional) The url to be inserted. This will be empty when inserting a new web reference.

__documentation.summary: Opens the web reference modal for editing a web reference. This modal has its modal title and primary button label already set.

params.name: modalIcon
params.description: (Optional) The icon being shown at the top of the modal. The value should be a valid font-awsome icon name.

params.name: modalPrimaryButtonLabel
params.description: (Optional) The label for the primary button. Defaults to `t__Save`.

params.name: modalTitle
params.description: (Optional) The title being shown at the top of the modal. Defaults to `t__Edit hyperlink`.
